channel.title: So I heard you like boss fights?
channel.description:
So I've been working on this little thing...
And as I finished making this guy, I thought I should show the outside world what I've been doing :D let me know what you guys think!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MD26k9VJZ18
P.S. Animations will be fixed once I start polishing things... at the moment I'm just dealing with the meat of things.

item.title: So I heard you like boss fights?
item.dc:creator: @fuzzout fuzzout
item.description:
@fuzzout wrote:

artem543:

Old demons models are weird. Looks like doggy style fudge lol.

o.0…
Old demons… ah yes, old demons look(ed) too… plain… yes.

I remember the new ones now… I didn’t like how they had one foot in front of the other XD it was weird.
By the way, the animations (that were missing in this video) are now all in (for every NPC), which is great!

Anyhow!

On another note! I will open the server for testing in a few minutes (just gotta spawn karamja and add transport methods to get there) :3 To see what people think and gather some feedback!

Read full topic
item.source: So I heard you like boss fights?

item.source: So I heard you like boss fights?

item.title: So I heard you like boss fights?
item.dc:creator: @fuzzout fuzzout
item.description:
@fuzzout wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:7, topic:539905”][quote author=fuzzout link=topic=658755.msg4406020#msg4406020 date=1391998627]

[quote author=Pure_ link=topic=658755.msg4406019#msg4406019 date=1391998530]

some suggestions

  • fix the animations
  • make him heal
  • make him summon minions (obviously they will die when he dies)
  • make him teleport you away (could get annoying though)
  • more variety of attacks
  • not so many special effects (him one hitting will get annoying after awhile)
  • make him lower your stats (only if they haven’t already been lowered)

needs work but good job dude
[/quote]You shouldn’t share drubs ideas from his little beta he held for us, that’s not really nice.

The thing is, they’re very… standard mmo-ish ideas… I am pretty sure I’ve had most of those myself (except for the lowering stat aspect, I don’t really enjoy that sort of thing …)
[/quote]I don’t see any servers out there incorporating them, regardless of how generic you may consider them. I stated what I did because I recall his amazement at Hago-Scape ™ he clearly hadn’t thought of said content before playing the game.[/quote]

I am willing to convince you! (not that you need convincing, I also want to show off! xD)
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bfa6i4pzvlU

Me coding waaaaay back in the day (just look at the upload date XD)

Read full topic

[quote=“Pure_, post:5, topic:539905”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=658755.msg4406009#msg4406009 date=1391996600]
some suggestions

  • fix the animations
  • make him heal
  • make him summon minions (obviously they will die when he dies)
  • make him teleport you away (could get annoying though)
  • more variety of attacks
  • not so many special effects (him one hitting will get annoying after awhile)
  • make him lower your stats (only if they haven’t already been lowered)

needs work but good job dude
[/quote]You shouldn’t share drubs ideas from his little beta he held for us, that’s not really nice.[/quote]
??? I wasn’t even thinking of drubs beta when I listed those ideas off lol

[quote=“fuzzout, post:6, topic:539905”][quote author=Pure_ link=topic=658755.msg4406019#msg4406019 date=1391998530]

some suggestions

  • fix the animations
  • make him heal
  • make him summon minions (obviously they will die when he dies)
  • make him teleport you away (could get annoying though)
  • more variety of attacks
  • not so many special effects (him one hitting will get annoying after awhile)
  • make him lower your stats (only if they haven’t already been lowered)

needs work but good job dude
[/quote]You shouldn’t share drubs ideas from his little beta he held for us, that’s not really nice.

The thing is, they’re very… standard mmo-ish ideas… I am pretty sure I’ve had most of those myself (except for the lowering stat aspect, I don’t really enjoy that sort of thing …)[/quote]I don’t see any servers out there incorporating them, regardless of how generic you may consider them. I stated what I did because I recall his amazement at Hago-Scape ™ he clearly hadn’t thought of said content before playing the game.

item.source: So I heard you like boss fights?

item.title: So I heard you like boss fights?
item.dc:creator: @fuzzout fuzzout
item.description:
@fuzzout wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:3, topic:539905”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=658755.msg4406009#msg4406009 date=1391996600]

  • make him summon minions (obviously they will die when he dies)
    [/quote]10 imps every 20 seconds
    imps constantly hit 2s and auto-attack

so you have to combat between imps and boss, and or attempt to kill the boss without touching imps; but after a while they stack up and will be draining more than you can heal.[/quote]

Now that’s pretty cool! I will definitely do something like that…
Or like summoning imps in random locations near the player, making them pulse area damage, making the player kill them or move the boss (this would also account for parties of people fighting chronozon)

Read full topic
